Address.value: 9020 NORTH CAPITAL OF TEXAS HIGHWAY,SUITE I-260 BUILDING 1, SUITE 260, AUSTIN, Texas, 78759, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: FTC Solar Inc is a global provider of advanced solar tracker systems, supported by proprietary software and value-added engineering services. It focuses on providing differentiated products, software and services that maximize energy generation and cost savings for customers, and to help facilitate the continued growth and adoption of solar power globally.
